Date: Monday, 6/9/1988
Subject: Chuck Carr learns new position
Chuck Carr has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Leftfield.
I would rate his skills as "B" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Saturday, 6/14/1988
Subject: Progress of Dean Hartgraves
Dear Sir,
Dean Hartgraves has an ERA of 3.74 at A San Jose Giants!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Frank Castillo healing process
Frank Castillo is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
